name: Plungeroo
description:
Pop, flip and roll your way through Plungeroo, a relaxing pinball-themed puzzle game! Tinker with colorful pinball cabinets and solve satisfyingly tricky puzzles

BE A PINBALL WIZARD

Set up the board using the pieces provided, pull the plunger and let 'er rip! Ricochet your way around corners, through portals and over switches to sink the ball down the drain. Bounce towards victory using your smarts to line up your shot and sink it in one!

THE ARCADE IS OPEN

Play through over 70 levels and 8 uniquely themed pinball cabinets ranging from golf courses to birthday cakes to the north pole! Colorful and playful vector art combines with an original soundtrack for a pleasant puzzling experience.

FEATURES

  • Over 70 thoughtfully designed puzzles
  • Unique pinball-themed gameplay
  • Colorful and pleasing vector art visuals
  • Lovely original soundtrack
  • Play at your own pace, no timers
  • Hints available to adjust difficulty

No quick reflexes or quarters required!
